snippet.title: Mythrealm | First Look | indie.io
snippet.description:
Wishlist Mythrealm now on Steam 
➤https://bit.ly/Mythrealm

Awaken, Alaris, and embark on a magical adventure to save the Mythrealm! 

Explore a fallen land of mystery and lore. Battle against dark and ancient monsters. Traverse deadly pitfalls, and advance your character in this fantasy 3rd person action RPG. Uncover the chaos that is darkening the land and fight for the magic that empowers the Mythrealm.

Visit indie.io on Steam 
➤https://bit.ly/4e91q5q

#indiegame #actionrpg #actionadventure
